subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Stefano Pirazzi won the 17th stage of the Giro d’Italia while Nairo Quintana retained the pink jersey as the overall leader.
snippet: Stefano Pirazzi won the 17th stage of the Giro d’Italia while Nairo Quintana retained the pink jersey as the overall leader.
